extension_description.message: Vvuunula ebiwandiiko ebirondeddwa ku mukutu gwa yintaneeti era okyuse mu nkola eragiddwa.

turn_off_description.message: Button ya Translate ejja kujja buli lwe wabaawo ebiwandiiko lwe birondeddwa

turn_on_description.message: Button ya Translate tejja kulabika nga ebiwandiiko birondeddwa naye okyayinza okuvvuunula ng’onyiga akabonero ka Pro Translate mu toolbar

auto_switch.message: Kyuusa mu ngeri ey’otoma okudda ku lulimi olwokubiri olugendererwamu

auto_switch_description.message: Ekiwandiiko ekirondeddwa bwe kiba olulimi olugendererwamu olusookerwako, kivvuunule mu lulimi olwokubiri olugendererwamu

target_format_description.message: Londa ensengeka y'ekigendererwa esookerwako, ensengeka esobola okukyusibwa mu kipande ky'okuvvuunula

auto_set_format.message: Teeka ensengeka esookerwako mu ngeri ey’otoma

auto_set_format_description.message: Bw’oba ​​okyusa ensengeka mu kipande ky’okuvvuunula, teeka ensengeka erongooseddwa ku nkola eya bulijjo

format_and_order_description.message: Format cases eziyinza okukyusibwa mu translation panel ne display order

translate_button_on_description.message: Button ya Translate ejja kujja buli lwe wabaawo ebiwandiiko lwe birondeddwa

translate_button_off_description.message: Button ya Translate tejja kulabika nga ebiwandiiko birondeddwa naye okyayinza okuvvuunula ng’onyiga akabonero ka Pro Translate mu toolbar
